title: Plat 4 ADC looking for Plat - Diamond Sup
body:
I've currently been getting back into ranked, was gold 4 last season and after placements was silver 4 and i've been climbing since. 

Currently been playing: Kalista, Tristana, Caitlyn and Vayne. But i'm open to any adc. 

Would love a support who can communicate well with. Skype preferably.

Thanks!

Msg here rank pls don't add me I won't accept.

replies.body: plat 3 atm, play most, added you
Currently gold 3 was plat 2 last season. Was gunna wait till I climbed to plat solo que for a duo but damn it's hard as a support...

Im a plat 4 support. Got demoted 2 days ago :'( 
What supports do you prefer? I can play every support equally except Bard i haven't got him yet lel. 
Add me in game plez :)
why u delete me? bruno WHY!
Shit bro, was a mistake. Was cleaning out my friends list
